list_definition.definition: to follow especially in order to catch or capture; to chase

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: They pursued the thief through the town.

list_definition.definition: to occupy oneself with (studies, enquiries etc); to continue

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: He is pursuing his studies at university.
